title: League of Legends Wont Open Nothing Happens !!!!!!
body:
League of Legends just wont open i have tried the new client and even going back to the old launcher it opens but if i press launch it just closes. Cant even play league. 
Anyone know how to fix or having the same issue 
Note: have tried the delete the folders in RADS and repairing folders on the launcher

replies.body:
I'd recommend ensuring you're launching League as admin (right-click, *run as admin*) before we dive further down the troubleshooting track. If that didn't fix it, it's possible that your connection to our servers is *unstable* and could prevent your patcher from reaching the login servers. In this case, I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if this helped.
